name: AZELAIC ACID
cautions: Cautions avoid contact with eyes, mouth, and mucous membranes
side-effects:
Side-effects local irritation (reduce frequency or discontinue
temporarily); less commonly skin discoloration; very rarely photosensitisation
doses:
acne vulgaris, apply twice daily (sensitive skin, once
daily for first week). Extended treatment may be required but manufacturer
advises period of treatment should not exceed 6 months
